name: Summer Camp
description: Each summer, Calvary operates a Summer Camp program. Intimate and fun, these small, mixed-age groups explore weekly themes with an emphasis on social interactions and hands-on discovery.
fullDescription: Each summer, Calvary operates a Summer Camp program. Intimate and fun, these small, mixed-age groups explore weekly themes with an emphasis on social interactions and hands-on discovery.
whatTheyOffer: Each summer, Calvary operates a Summer Camp program. Intimate and fun, these small, mixed-age groups explore weekly themes with an emphasis on social interactions and hands-on discovery.
howToGetIt: All the steps for admissions are located online at https://www.calvarynurseryschoolsf.org/admissions. For more information call or email office.
cost: This is a fee based service. Sliding scale available with income verified income requirements
